title: KIM SWITCH / JOYCE DRUGS
description: Little talk to Kim where he discusses undertaking the jam mystery w you

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This isn't going very well.""

links.title: You: ""How did you hope it would go?""
links.text: "How did you hope it would go?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly, I was expecting you to u..."
links.text: "Honestly, I was expecting you to use your *unorthodox technique* to keep her off-balance -- and you know... *not* volunteer us to be her henchmen."

links.title: You: ""Oh, so we're henchmen now?""
links.text: "Oh, so we're henchmen now?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This woman is running circles arou..."
links.text: "This woman is running circles around us. She might have known about your *misplaced badge* all along -- or she's simply an adept improviser. Either way, we've played straight into her hands."

links.title: Empathy: "He doesn't let it show, but there i..."
links.text: He doesn't let it show, but there is a limit to how much the consequences of your unprofessional behaviour can cost the investigation.

links.title: Logic: "Maybe this is all her plan? She mig..."
links.text: Maybe this is all her plan? She might have heard about you.

links.title: You: ""I am sorry for putting us in this..."
links.text: "I am sorry for putting us in this situation -- I'll handle it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm sure you will, detective.""
links.text: "I'm sure you will, detective."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would not hurt if you *tried* m..."
links.text: "It would not hurt if you *tried* more in the future, yes."

links.title: You: ""The company must have more ears on..."
links.text: "The company must have more ears on the ground -- she could have known about my *condition*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I wouldn't go that far. Her reacti..."
links.text: "I wouldn't go that far. Her reaction did come off as sincere to me... I think she's just quick to adapt. She is a professional, after all."

links.title: You: ""Her *proposal* was likely part of..."
links.text: "Her *proposal* was likely part of her design. This all is."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Knowing this does not really..."
links.text: "Yes. Knowing this does not really change our position, however."

links.title: You: ""What do you propose -- that we *do..."
links.text: "What do you propose -- that we *don't* investigate the drug trafficking?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. If there is reasonable suspici..."
links.text: "No. If there is reasonable suspicion, we must investigate. Otherwise she could claim we're siding with the Union. Or that we're on their take. We'd never hear the end of it..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What I propose is -- we ask her. T..."
links.text: "What I propose is -- we ask her. Then we investigate. *Briefly*..." He adjusts his glasses. "But do *not* share the outcome of this investigation with her. We tell her it's done and demand for her information on the lynching."

links.title: You: ""We could just, you know, find my b..."
links.text: "We could just, you know, find my badge."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh," he nods slowly. "That would b..."
links.text: "Oh," he nods slowly. "That would be *fantastic*. But do we have the time? The world is large -- and your badge is eight-by-six centimetres."

links.title: Logic: "The situation might have changed dr..."
links.text: The situation might have changed drastically by the time you locate it. Time is of the essence...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You could request a new one from y..."
links.text: "You could request a new one from your station but that would literally take *months*."

links.title: You: ""Let's get back to her then." [Conc..."
links.text: "Let's get back to her then." [Conclude.]

links.title: You: ""Really? I thought it was going so..."
links.text: "Really? I thought it was going so well."
